name: Updates here: https://userstyles.world/style/5243
description:
23-06-2022
-I only update on https://userstyles.world/style/5243/hossori from now on, cuz this site sucks.

A sleeker look for the already sleek anilist.

Usable with automail.
https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/370473-aniscripts

I used some code by Reina. 
https://github.com/Reinachan/AniList-High-Contrast-Dark-Theme
Copyright notice:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Reinachan/AniList-High-Contrast-Dark-Theme/main/LICENSE
